room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy" by Cape Fear Escape Room in Wilmington
review: This was a fantastic birthday activity for my 14 year old daughter and her friends. They loved the Speakeasy room!! The staff was very helpful in explaining how to get started. It was challenging and they had to work together. They had a blast!

room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy" by Cape Fear Escape Room in Wilmington
review: Had a great time and staff was very nice and helpful. Speakeasy was great!

room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy" by Cape Fear Escape Room in Wilmington
review: Went with several co-workers for the Speakeasy escape room. We had such a great time! We loved the variety of challenges we had to solve in order to escape - looking forward to doing another!

room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy" by Cape Fear Escape Room in Wilmington
review: This place is awesome! It's a great team building activity to do with coworkers, family, or even make a date night out of it! I will be back.

room_title: Escape room "Speakeasy" by Cape Fear Escape Room in Wilmington
review: Tried out the Cape Fear Escape Room experience as a team building event with colleagues. Turned out to be a blast! Across the team everyone loved it and had great things to say - especially in comparison to "typical corporate team building events'. Highly recommended if you're looking for that team building with a twist. (Also did it with my family separately and that was a blast as well - so something for everyone)!
